titles.title: Nutrition CARE Act of 2025
Nutrition CARE Act of 2025
Nutrition Counseling Aiding Recovery for Eating Disorders Act of 2025
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of medical nutrition therapy services for individuals with eating disorders under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
